# Feedback by Agent

Feedback entries organized by affected agent.

**Agents**:
- `backend-developer/` - Backend service issues
- `frontend-developer/` - Frontend component issues
- `qa-engineer/` - QA/testing process issues
- `security-engineer/` - Security pattern issues
- `devops-engineer/` - Infrastructure/deployment issues
- `scrum-master/` - Coordination/process issues
- `documentation-developer/` - Documentation structure issues
- `[other-agents]/` - As created

**Each agent folder contains**:
- Individual feedback files: `{YYYY-MM-DD}-{issue-title}.md`
- Monthly summary: `summary.md` (created by @scrum-master)

---

**Last Updated**: 30. Dezember 2025
